intro: Psychotria heterophylla, commonly known as the variable leaf psychotria, is a species of flowering plant in the Rubiaceae family. It is native to tropical regions of Central and South America, where it typically grows in humid, shaded environments. The plant is characterized by its variable leaf shapes and sizes, which can range from ovate to elliptical. Its small, white or pale yellow flowers are clustered in umbels, and it produces small, dark berries as fruit. Psychotria heterophylla is often found in lowland rainforests and is sometimes used in traditional medicine.
